bruh: an expression of disbelief or annoyance
fam: short for family; used to refer to close friends or people you trust
smh: an acronym for shaking my head; used to express disappointment or disapproval
snack: someone who is very attractive or appealing
mood: a word or phrase that captures how one is feeling or what one wants to do
noob: a beginner or inexperienced person, especially in gaming or online activities
lit: very exciting or amazing; also used to describe something that is on fire or very bright
shade: a subtle or indirect insult or criticism
savage: someone who is very cool or impressive; also used to describe something that is very harsh or brutal
flex: to show off or boast about something
